message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. I appreciate your interest. While $9,500 is a good starting point, I'm still looking for a bit more. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can make this work.
